userStories.title: Scrape all vehicle/build URLs
acceptanceCriteria: Extract all item URLs from search results
userStories.notes: Created scrape_urls.py - uses urllib and regex for URL extraction. Will iterate through all pages.

userStories.title: Verify URL count and update expectedUrls
userStories.notes: SITE REQUIRES JAVASCRIPT: Listings loaded via AJAX/masonry after page load. Static HTML contains no item URLs. Requires browser automation (Selenium/Puppeteer) to extract data.
